name: Delta wings
description:
Collect all rings and banners of each level and reach the "goal" to open the next level, there are 8 in total.

Use directional keys an space bar to move your self.

"r" = restart game

"p" and "enter" = pause game

"esc" = exit game

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9HK_u2krZoc
